name: ipa hub
subtitle: a source with IOS IPA’S
description:
Here you'll find IOS IPA’S

discord: deepleeted

apps.name: Twitter
apps.subtitle: Awesome tweak for Twitter
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
•Download Videos (even if account private).
Custom Tab Bar
•No history feature.
•Hide topics tweet feature.
•Disable video layer caption.
•Padlock.
•Font changer.
•Enable the new UI of DM search.
•Auto load photos in highest quality feature.
•Undo tweet feature.
•Theme (like Twitter Blue).
•App icon changer
•Twitter Circle feature.
•Copying profile information feature.
•Save tweet as an image.
•Hide spaces bar.
•Disable RTL.
•Always open in Safari.
•Translate bio.
•Disable new tweet style (A.K.A edge to edge tweet)
•Enable voice tweet and voice message in DM.
•Hide promoted tweet from the timeline.
•Confirm alert when hit the tweet button.
•Confirm alert when hit like button.
•Confirm alert when hit follow button.
•FLEX for debugging.

versions.localizedDescription:
•Fix all the crashes in the newer versions.
•Add the new tabs to the hide page.
•New feature: DM replay later page and tags.
•New feature: Upload 4K media.
•New feature: Voice feature in posts and replies.
•Update the localizations.
•Remove unnecessary options.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: X uses bluetooth to discover Cast-enabled devices near you.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Capture and post photos and videos from X.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This helps X show you more relevant ads.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you download photos and videos to your Photos.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: X uses the local network to discover Cast-enabled devices on your WiFi network.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Going forward, whenever you choose to share captions on this device, Apple will provide the service. Doing so helps make sure people of all hearing abilities can access your content.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: Enjoy the X experience tailored to your location.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Add events to your calendar from X.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Capture and post videos with sound from X.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Enjoy the X experience tailored to your location.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Use FaceID to authenticate on X.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: We will securely upload your contacts to our servers to help you connect with friends and suggest users to follow on X.

versions.localizedDescription:
Release Notes:
•Fix issue with imgur multi-image uploads consistently failing. Note that multi-image uploads still fail on the first attempt but should succeed on the next attempt.

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used to save media or to select images to upload for sharing.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Checked once to calculate sunset/sunrise times for the location.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Used to take photos to upload for sharing.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Detect rotations in Media Viewer and offer corresponding options.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Unlock Apollo when re-opening in order to prevent unauthorized access.

apps.name: YouTube
apps.subtitle: YouTube with more features!
apps.localizedDescription: YouTube for iOS, supercharged with dayanch96 YouTube Plus (ex. YTLite) and several other tweaks.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

apps.name: Spotify
apps.subtitle: A tweak to get Spotify Premium for free, just like Spotilife
apps.localizedDescription: This tweak makes Spotify think you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening, just like Spotilife, and provides some additional features like custom lyrics.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify view and add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This lets Spotify add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify access calendars you may have shared with your contacts.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.

apps.name: Enmity
apps.subtitle: 🧩 The power of addons, all in your hand. Built on top of DISCORD.
apps.localizedDescription: Enmity is a project built on top of DISCORD to provide plug-ins and themes along with access to internal Discord functionality.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: By allowing access to your camera, you can take pictures and others will be able to see you in voice and video calls.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: We can help you find people you know on Discord. Your contacts will be regularly sent to us so you can connect with friends. You can turn this off any time.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Allow Discord access to your local network to find devices using the same internet connection.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: To enable services that require location
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: To enable services that require location
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: To enable services that require location
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: By allowing access to your microphone, you'll be able to talk in calls.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: By allowing access to your library, you'll be able to download photos and videos.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: By allowing us access to your photos, you will be able to upload images as an avatar, server icon, and more, and you can send photos and videos to your friends and communities.

apps.name: Streamer
apps.subtitle: App for Tracking Movies and TV shows on iOS and tvOS
apps.localizedDescription:
Streamer iOS App for Streaming Movies and TV shows on iOS and tvOS

Stream all TV shows and Movies from multiple websites
Supports Chromecast to stream to FireTV and Chromecasts
Supports multi-language subtitles for iOS and tvOS
Favorite functionality to quickly access your favorite shows and movies
Supported providers

🇺🇸 MovieBoxPro: 4k English content with multi-language subtitles
🇺🇸 Flixtor.video: English content with multi-language subtitles and HQ streaming
🇺🇸 FlixHQ.to: English content
🇺🇸 PutLocker.vip: English content
🇫🇷 Empire-stream.net: French content
🇩🇪 KinoKiste.club: German content
🇩🇪 FilmPalast.to: German content
🇸🇦 Akwam.to: Arabic content
🇸🇦 Arabseed.ink: Arabic content
🇸🇦 FaselHD.vip: Arabic content
🇰🇷 ViewAsian.co: Asian content
⾞ Kaido.to: Anime content

versions.localizedDescription:
Bug Fixes:

•MultiProviderSearch now works like it’s supposed to. Search away!

•Sora Fixes - hopefully no more surprise naughty videos (still NSFW, so proceed with caution).

•Stremio ID issue - patched up!

•Stremio catalog bug - full category names are back. No more guessing.

•Progress bar fix - it finally knows how to behave.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Streamer uses the local network to discover Cast-enabled devices on your WiFi network.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Some ad content may access camera to take picture.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Streamer uses the local network to discover Cast-enabled devices on your WiFi network.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Some ad content may require access to accelerometer for interactive ad experience.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Some ad content may require access to the photo library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: App would like to access IDFA for tracking purpose

apps.name: HD Flix (NO ADS)
apps.subtitle: a movie/anime/show app
apps.localizedDescription: With HD Flix on your phone, you are able to watch HD film content and shows. The User Interface that you see in the app is truly the best thing about it. Easy navigation and responsive design made it stand at the top of the list.

versions.localizedDescription:
✨what makes this version better? 
⚡️super-fast streaming with crisp 4K Ultra HD quality 
🌐voiceover options in multiple languages & AI-powered subtitles
🛡️built for stability - minimal lag or crashes
🔄regular maintenance & trusted long-term support
🚀cleaner, faster, and easier-to-use interface

privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: The application needs access to the microphone to recognize your voice to convert voice to title of the journey.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The application needs access to the photo library to create the journey.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: The application needs access to speech recognition to convert your voice to title of the journey.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
